name: Elven Accuracy
text: Your sharp eyesight makes difficult shots easier.
benefit: If you miss due to concealment when making a ranged attack with a longbow or shortbow (including composite bows), you can reroll your miss chance roll one time to see if you actually hit.
staminaText: If you miss an attack with a longbow or shortbow due to concealment, you can spend 5 stamina points to automatically succeed at the miss chance reroll from this feat.
mythicText: Your elven eyesight cuts though concealment.
mythicBenefit: When you make an attack with a longbow or short bow (including composite bows), you can ignore concealment, but not total concealment. You still suffer a miss chance for total concealment, but if you miss due to total concealment, you may reroll your miss chance as per Elven Accuracy.
text_zh: 你那敏锐的视觉使得困难的射击变得从容。
benefit_zh: 如果你使用长弓或短弓（包括复合弓）进行远程攻击，却由于隐蔽而失手，那么你能够重新投掷一次失手率检定来看看你是否真的命中。
mythicText_zh: 精灵天生的视觉能力会让你找到敌人掩体的缺口。
mythicBenefit_zh: 当你使用长弓或短弓（包括复合弓）进行攻击时，你能够忽略隐蔽（concealment），但是无法忽略全隐蔽（total concealment）。你仍旧会受到全隐蔽带来的失手率，但是如果你由于全隐蔽而失手，那么你就可以如同精灵之眼专长一般重掷失手率。
staminaText_zh: 花费5点耐力，你可在重投失手检定时自动通过。
